title: NXP JCOP4.x on P73N2M0B0.2C2/2C6 Secure Element
table_of_contents: Usage and Major Security Features of the TOE
Security Objectives for the Operational En-vironment
Definition of Family ”Generation of random numbers (FCS_RNG)”
Security Requirements Rationale for the TOE
Protection against Interference and Logi-cal Tampering
Protection against Bypass of Security Re-lated Actions

revisions.description: P73.2C2 and P73.2C6 are combined in P73.2C2/2C6 certificate
